propertyInfos.label: Background image
propertyInfos.hint: Image to use for the start page background.
propertyInfos.name: startBackground

propertyInfos.label: Start button
propertyInfos.hint: Image to use for the start button.
propertyInfos.name: startButton

propertyInfos.label: Show logo
propertyInfos.hint: Shows or hides the logo and its link on the start page.
propertyInfos.name: startShowLogo

propertyInfos.label: Logo
propertyInfos.hint: Image to use for the logo displayed on the start page.
propertyInfos.name: logoImage

propertyInfos.label: Logo URL
propertyInfos.hint: URL to launch when the logo on the start page is clicked.
propertyInfos.name: logoUrl

propertyInfos.label: Base font size
propertyInfos.hint: Sets the base font size used throughout the app.
propertyInfos.name: baseFontSize

propertyInfos.label: Font file
propertyInfos.name: customTextFontTTF
propertyInfos.hint: Sets the font to be used throughout the app.

propertyInfos.label: Font color
propertyInfos.hint: Color to use for the title on the start page.
propertyInfos.name: titleColor

propertyInfos.label: Font scale
propertyInfos.hint: Scale factor to apply to the base font size for use by the title text on the start page.
propertyInfos.name: titleFontScale

propertyInfos.label: Font file
propertyInfos.name: customTitleFontTTF
propertyInfos.hint: Sets the font to be used just for the app title on the start page.

propertyInfos.label: Font color
propertyInfos.hint: Color to use for the subtitle text on the start page.
propertyInfos.name: subtitleColor

propertyInfos.label: Font scale
propertyInfos.hint: Scale factor to apply to the base font size for use by the subtitle text on the start page.
propertyInfos.name: subtitleFontScale

propertyInfos.label: Show licence
propertyInfos.hint: Shows or hides the licence information.
propertyInfos.name: startShowLicenseInfo

propertyInfos.label: Show information
propertyInfos.hint: Shows or hides the 'i' icon on the start page.
propertyInfos.name: showDescriptionOnStartup

propertyInfos.label: Require sign in to ArcGIS
propertyInfos.hint: Prompts for an ArcGIS organization sign in before showing the app content.
propertyInfos.name: doLogin

propertyInfos.label: Show gallery
propertyInfos.hint: Indicates to the app whether you want to display a gallery of map tours. Your app can contain one or multiple map tours. The map tours are displayed based on the queryString property. When the gallery is shown, the user must select an item from the gallery to view the tour.
propertyInfos.name: showGallery

propertyInfos.label: Background image
propertyInfos.hint: Image to use for the gallery page background.
propertyInfos.name: galleryBackground

propertyInfos.text: Select an existing map tour style story map web application

propertyInfos.hint: Enter a single map tour id or a string to query many map tours
propertyInfos.name: queryString

propertyInfos.text: Or enter an existing web map which has at least one point layer and has fields designated for title, description, thumbnail and full image

propertyInfos.hint: Unique identifier of an existing web map which contains at least one point layer and has fields for title, description, thumbnail and full image.
propertyInfos.name: webmapid

propertyInfos.label: ArcGIS organisation ID
propertyInfos.hint: Your ArcGIS organization ID to be used in the query to restrict results to your organization only. Leave blank if unknown.
propertyInfos.name: orgId

propertyInfos.label: Portal query item types
propertyInfos.hint: Used to restrict the types of items returned from the query. Typically it will be type:\Web Mapping Application if you're using existing map tour apps or type:\Web Map if you have web maps that have map tour layers in them.
propertyInfos.name: portalQueryItemTypes

propertyInfos.label: Portal sort field
propertyInfos.hint: Used to sort tours. Possible values include: title, created, type, owner, modified, avgRating, numRatings, numComments, numViews.
propertyInfos.name: portalSortField

propertyInfos.label: Portal sort order
propertyInfos.hint: Used in conjunction with portal sort field to order tours.
propertyInfos.name: portalSortOrder

propertyInfos.label: Base map URL
propertyInfos.hint: Overwrites the basemap that is contained within the map tour web map for use as the basemap of the app.
propertyInfos.name: basemapUrl

propertyInfos.label: Show basemap switcher
propertyInfos.hint: Shows or hides the basemap switching tool on the map.
propertyInfos.name: showBasemapSwitcher

propertyInfos.label: Map scale
propertyInfos.hint: Zoom level the map will display at, when a user clicks on a photo in the gallery.
propertyInfos.name: mapScale

propertyInfos.label: Tour layer ID
propertyInfos.hint: If your web map has more than one point layer enter the name of layer for the tour (optional).
propertyInfos.name: tourlayerId

propertyInfos.label: Text background color
propertyInfos.hint: Color to use for the text background. Used for the tour and about screen headers, alert boxes and window dialogs.
propertyInfos.name: textBackgroundColor

propertyInfos.label: Description field
propertyInfos.hint: Name of the field from the geodatabase or feature collection that contains the text description to be displayed for each point in the map tour.
propertyInfos.name: maptour_descriptionField

propertyInfos.label: Auto crop images
propertyInfos.hint: If true, images that are shown in the gallery of features will be cropped instead of resized. This is good for very large images.
propertyInfos.name: autoCropImage

propertyInfos.label: Custom renderer
propertyInfos.hint: If true, the app will use the four icon colors of red, blue, green, and purple, or default black, to render the map tour points in the map tour layer.
propertyInfos.name: maptour_customRenderer

propertyInfos.label: Custom sort
propertyInfos.hint: If true, the app will sort the features based upon the maptour_customSortField.
propertyInfos.name: maptour_customSort

propertyInfos.label: Sort field
propertyInfos.hint: Name of the field from the geodatabase or feature collection that contains the sort order of features for the map tour.
propertyInfos.name: maptour_customSortField

propertyInfos.label: Custom sort order
propertyInfos.hint: Only used when the map tour app is powered by feature services, to define the ordering of tour points. Arranges the tour points in either ascending or descending order.
propertyInfos.name: maptour_customSortOrder

propertyInfos.label: Custom color field
propertyInfos.hint: Name of the field which contains the icon color (possible values are R, B, G, P). This is used to provide app with the name of the icon field to use when the map tour is powered by just web maps and custom layers.
propertyInfos.name: maptour_iconColorField

propertyInfos.label: Custom image field
propertyInfos.hint: Name of the field from the geodatabase or feature collection that contains the URL of the full size image to be displayed for each point in the map tour.
propertyInfos.name: maptour_imageField

propertyInfos.label: Custom thumbnail field
propertyInfos.hint: Name of the field from the geodatabase or feature collection that contains the URL of the thumbnail image to be displayed for each point in the map tour.
propertyInfos.name: maptour_thumbnailField

propertyInfos.label: Custom title field
propertyInfos.hint: Name of the field from the geodatabase or feature collection that contains the title to be displayed for each point in the map tour.
propertyInfos.name: maptour_titleField
